channel.title: about on alec trusty
channel.description: Recent content in about on alec trusty

item.description: My name is Alec Trusty. On paper, I’m a geographer with some tech skills. In real life, I’m a simple Oregonian who loves his fiance and a good adventure. If you’d like to chat, feel free to contact me at any of the provided links below. e-mail | github | linkedIn

Experience NV5 Geospatial / Senior GIS Technician October 2019 - Present Independent Contractor / GIS & Data Services June 2019 - October 2019 UBC: Reproduced a Walkability Index surface model UD4H: Wrote a lot of R code to support various projects. Research Analyst / SUPR Lab January 2017 - January 2018 Wrangled a ton of spatial and aspatial data into a single PostgreSQL database to inform programmatic decision making at Energy Trust of Oregon Publications Link - Antonopoulos C.

Publications Urban Heat Islands & Residential Energy Consumption Python OpenHydro LandSat-Grabber Data Visualization Shiny Dashboard | Proof of Concept | Code ESRI Story Map | Arctic Area-Based Management
